00087     template<class T>
00088     void build( T*& pT, const char** ppAttributeList )
00089     throw( DWFException )
00090     {
00091         pT = DWFCORE_ALLOC_OBJECT( T );
00092 
00093         if (pT == NULL)
00094         {
00095             _DWFCORE_THROW( DWFMemoryException, /*NOXLATE*/L"Failed to allocate OPCXMLBuildable object" );
00096         }
00097 
00098         pT->parseAttributeList( ppAttributeList );
00099     }
